Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN CatalogProducts.UseBatches THEN 2 ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN CatalogCharacteristics.DeletionMark THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PictureIndex, CatalogCharacteristics.Owner AS ProductsRef, CatalogProducts.VATRate AS VATRate, CatalogCharacteristics.Ref AS CharacteristicRef, VALUE(Catalog.ProductsBatches.EmptyRef) AS BatchRef, ISNULL(PricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit, CatalogProducts.MeasurementUnit) AS MeasurementUnit, ISNULL(UOM.Factor, 1) AS Factor, ISNULL((CAST(PricesSliceLast.Price * (&PriceKindCurrencyRate * &DocumentCurrencyMultiplicity) / (&DocumentCurrencyRate * &PriceKindCurrencyMultiplicity) AS NUMBER(15, 2))) + (CAST(PricesSliceLast.Price * (&PriceKindCurrencyRate * &DocumentCurrencyMultiplicity) / (&DocumentCurrencyRate * &PriceKindCurrencyMultiplicity) AS NUMBER(15, 2))) / 100 * &DynamicPriceKindPercent, 0) AS Price, CAST(ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) / ISNULL(UOM.Factor, 1) AS NUMBER(15, 3)) AS InStock, CASE WHEN ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Reserve, CAST((ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0)) / ISNULL(UOM.Factor, 1) AS NUMBER(15, 3)) AS Available, ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0) AS AvailableBasicUOM FROM Catalog.ProductsCharacteristics AS CatalogCharacteristics LEFT JOIN Catalog.Products AS CatalogProducts ON CatalogCharacteristics.Owner = CatalogProducts.Ref LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.Prices.SliceLast( &PricePeriod, PriceKind = &PriceKind AND Characteristic <> VALUE(Catalog.ProductsCharacteristics.EmptyRef)) AS PricesSliceLast ON CatalogCharacteristics.Owner = PricesSliceLast.Products AND CatalogCharacteristics.Ref = PricesSliceLast.Characteristic LEFT JOIN Catalog.UOM AS UOM ON (PricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit = UOM.Ref) LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance( , Company = &Company AND Characteristic <> VALUE(Catalog.ProductsCharacteristics.EmptyRef) AND (StructuralUnit = &StockWarehouse OR &StockWarehouse = VALUE(Catalog.BusinessUnits.EmptyRef))) AS InventoryRemains ON CatalogCharacteristics.Owner = InventoryRemains.Products AND CatalogCharacteristics.Ref = InventoryRemains.Characteristic LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND Characteristic <> VALUE(Catalog.ProductsCharacteristics.EmptyRef) AND SalesOrder <> UNDEFINED AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.BusinessUnits AND (StructuralUnit = &StockWarehouse OR &StockWarehouse = VALUE(Catalog.BusinessUnits.EmptyRef))) AS InventoryReserves ON CatalogCharacteristics.Owner = InventoryReserves.Products AND CatalogCharacteristics.Ref = InventoryReserves.Characteristic

SELECT InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.StructuralUnit AS StructuralUnit, &StructuralUnit AS DocumentStructuralUnit, InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnit AS IsDocumentStructuralUnit, InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.Products AS Products, CAST(ISNULL(InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.QuantityBalance, 0) / &Factor AS NUMBER(15, 3)) AS InStock, CAST(ISNULL(InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance, 0) / &Factor AS NUMBER(15, 3)) AS Reserved, CAST((ISNULL(InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance, 0)) / &Factor AS NUMBER(15, 3)) AS Available FROM AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance(, Company = &Company) AS InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.BusinessUnits AND SalesOrder <> UNDEFINED) AS InventoryBalances ON InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.StructuralUnit = InventoryBalances.StructuralUnit AND InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.Products = InventoryBalances.Products

SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN CatalogProducts.UseCharacteristics OR CatalogProducts.UseBatches THEN 2 ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN CatalogProducts.DeletionMark THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PictureIndex, CatalogProducts.Ref AS ProductsRef, VALUE(Catalog.ProductsCharacteristics.EmptyRef) AS CharacteristicRef, VALUE(Catalog.ProductsBatches.EmptyRef) AS BatchRef, CatalogProducts.Parent AS Parent, CatalogProducts.Code AS Code, CatalogProducts.Description AS Description, CatalogProducts.SKU AS SKU, ISNULL(PricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit, CatalogProducts.MeasurementUnit) AS MeasurementUnit, ISNULL(UOM.Factor, 1) AS Factor, CatalogProducts.BusinessLine AS BusinessLine, CatalogProducts.ProductsCategory AS ProductsCategory, CatalogProducts.Vendor AS Vendor, CatalogProducts.Warehouse AS Warehouse, CatalogProducts.ReplenishmentMethod AS ReplenishmentMethod, CatalogProducts.ReplenishmentDeadline AS ReplenishmentDeadline, CatalogProducts.VATRate AS VATRate, CatalogProducts.ProductsType AS ProductsType, CatalogProducts.Cell AS Cell, CatalogProducts.PriceGroup AS PriceGroup, CatalogProducts.UseCharacteristics AS UseCharacteristics, CatalogProducts.UseBatches AS UseBatches, CatalogProducts.CountryOfOrigin AS CountryOfOrigin, ISNULL((CAST(PricesSliceLast.Price * (&PriceKindCurrencyRate * &DocumentCurrencyMultiplicity) / (&DocumentCurrencyRate * &PriceKindCurrencyMultiplicity) AS NUMBER(15, 2))) + (CAST(PricesSliceLast.Price * (&PriceKindCurrencyRate * &DocumentCurrencyMultiplicity) / (&DocumentCurrencyRate * &PriceKindCurrencyMultiplicity) AS NUMBER(15, 2))) / 100 * &DynamicPriceKindPercent, 0) AS Price, CAST(ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) / ISNULL(UOM.Factor, 1) AS NUMBER(15, 3)) AS InStock, CASE WHEN ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Reserve, CAST((ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0)) / ISNULL(UOM.Factor, 1) AS NUMBER(15, 3)) AS Available, ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0) AS AvailableBasicUOM FROM Catalog.Products AS CatalogProducts LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.Prices.SliceLast( &PricePeriod, PriceKind = &PriceKind AND Characteristic = VALUE(Catalog.ProductsCharacteristics.EmptyRef)) AS PricesSliceLast ON CatalogProducts.Ref = PricesSliceLast.Products LEFT JOIN Catalog.UOM AS UOM ON (PricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit = UOM.Ref) LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance( , Company = &Company AND (StructuralUnit = &StockWarehouse OR &StockWarehouse = VALUE(Catalog.BusinessUnits.EmptyRef))) AS InventoryRemains ON CatalogProducts.Ref = InventoryRemains.Products LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND SalesOrder <> UNDEFINED AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.BusinessUnits AND (StructuralUnit = &StockWarehouse OR &StockWarehouse = VALUE(Catalog.BusinessUnits.EmptyRef))) AS InventoryReserves ON CatalogProducts.Ref = InventoryReserves.Products WHERE CatalogProducts.ProductsType IN(&ProductsType) AND NOT CatalogProducts.IsFolder

SELECT CASE WHEN CatalogBatches.DeletionMark THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PictureIndex, CatalogBatches.Owner AS ProductsRef, CatalogProducts.VATRate AS VATRate, CatalogBatches.Ref AS BatchRef, &Characteristic AS CharacteristicRef, ISNULL(PricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit, CatalogProducts.MeasurementUnit) AS MeasurementUnit, ISNULL(UOM.Factor, 1) AS Factor, ISNULL((CAST(PricesSliceLast.Price * (&PriceKindCurrencyRate * &DocumentCurrencyMultiplicity) / (&DocumentCurrencyRate * &PriceKindCurrencyMultiplicity) AS NUMBER(15, 2))) + (CAST(PricesSliceLast.Price * (&PriceKindCurrencyRate * &DocumentCurrencyMultiplicity) / (&DocumentCurrencyRate * &PriceKindCurrencyMultiplicity) AS NUMBER(15, 2))) / 100 * &DynamicPriceKindPercent, 0) AS Price, CAST(ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) / ISNULL(UOM.Factor, 1) AS NUMBER(15, 3)) AS InStock, CASE WHEN ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Reserve, CAST((ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0)) / ISNULL(UOM.Factor, 1) AS NUMBER(15, 3)) AS Available, ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0) AS AvailableBasicUOM FROM Catalog.ProductsBatches AS CatalogBatches LEFT JOIN Catalog.Products AS CatalogProducts ON CatalogBatches.Owner = CatalogProducts.Ref LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.Prices.SliceLast( &PricePeriod, PriceKind = &PriceKind AND Characteristic = &Characteristic) AS PricesSliceLast ON CatalogBatches.Owner = PricesSliceLast.Products LEFT JOIN Catalog.UOM AS UOM ON (PricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit = UOM.Ref) LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance( , Company = &Company AND Characteristic = &Characteristic AND (StructuralUnit = &StockWarehouse OR &StockWarehouse = VALUE(Catalog.BusinessUnits.EmptyRef))) AS InventoryRemains ON CatalogBatches.Owner = InventoryRemains.Products AND CatalogBatches.Ref = InventoryRemains.Batch LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND Characteristic = &Characteristic AND SalesOrder <> UNDEFINED AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.BusinessUnits AND (StructuralUnit = &StockWarehouse OR &StockWarehouse = VALUE(Catalog.BusinessUnits.EmptyRef))) AS InventoryReserves ON CatalogBatches.Owner = InventoryReserves.Products AND CatalogBatches.Ref = InventoryReserves.Batch
